"Keep your stapler handy and your dreams within reach. With consistent effort, you can achieve greatness."
"A stapler may seem like a simple tool, but with dedication and focus, it can help you staple your goals to success."
"Just like a stapler that keeps papers together, your efforts and goals will stick together and lead to outstanding achievements."
"Your stapler is a symbol of your commitment to your goals. Keep it close and let it remind you to stay focused and dedicated."
"Consistent effort and a stapler can help you staple your dreams to reality. Keep pushing forward and you will achieve greatness."
